Districts.Name: District 1
Districts.Details: The central urban district, featuring major tourist attractions, government offices, and commercial centers.

Districts.Name: District 2
Districts.Details: Known for its upscale residential areas and expatriate communities.

Districts.Name: District 3
Districts.Details: A densely populated area known for its French colonial architecture.

Districts.Name: District 4
Districts.Details: One of the smallest districts, known for its local seafood restaurants.

Districts.Name: District 5
Districts.Details: Known as Chinatown, famous for its markets and Chinese temples.

Districts.Name: District 6
Districts.Details: A more residential area with a significant Chinese community.

Districts.Name: District 7
Districts.Details: Known for the modern Phu My Hung area, popular with expatriates and middle-class Vietnamese.

Districts.Name: District 8
Districts.Details: Primarily residential, less developed compared to other districts.

Districts.Name: District 9
Districts.Details: Known for its high-tech park and educational institutions.

Districts.Name: District 10
Districts.Details: Known for its vibrant street food scene and bustling markets.

Districts.Name: District 11
Districts.Details: Residential with famous sports complexes and parks.

Districts.Name: District 12
Districts.Details: A developing suburban area with a mix of residential and industrial zones.

Districts.Name: Binh Thanh District
Districts.Details: Mix of residential and commercial areas, connecting the city center to the outskirts.

Districts.Name: Phu Nhuan District
Districts.Details: Densely populated with a mix of residential and commercial developments.

Districts.Name: Tan Binh District
Districts.Details: Home to Tan Son Nhat International Airport and several residential areas.

Districts.Name: Go Vap District
Districts.Details: Predominantly residential and one of the most populous districts.
